ЁЯПЖ
Battle of Talakad

Vishnuvardhana (Bittideva) was the most important ruler of the Hoysala dynasty. He defeated the Cholas in the Battle of Talakad, captured the Gangavadi region (Mysore), and assumed the title 'Talakonda'.

ЁЯЫХ
Chennakeshava Temple

Influenced by the famous Vaishnava saint Ramanujacharya, he abandoned Jainism and embraced Vaishnavism. In commemoration of his victory, he built the famous Chennakeshava Temple in Belur, which is a jewel of Hoysala architecture.
